title: Playboy: Red Hot Redheads
overview: Join a cast of crimson-haired cuties as Playboy unveils a collection of Playmates and Playboy models who are guaranteed to spark your passion and light your fire. From warm auburn shades to ruby red, their smoldering sexuality is just waiting to ignite. They'll stir your desires and leave you yearning for more as you see what's behind the mystique of these extraordinary and incomparable women. Our blazing beauties come together in a collection that's pure ruby rapture!
